1.title: Picture Planes
1.plot: Sarah & Duck experiment with paper aeroplanes and discover an unusual quirk...

2.title: Hat Fuss
2.plot: When Scarf Lady is 'knit-stuck', Sarah & Duck take her to a hat museum for inspiration, only to meet up with an old nemesis!

3.title: Dewy Morning
3.plot: When the Art Shop is closed, Sarah & Duck explore the park in the early morning.

4.title: Sticker Swap
4.plot: Sarah goes on a hunt around town to search for an elusive Seacow sticker!

5.title: Train Fudge
5.plot: When the bus breaks down on the way to the Big Shop, Sarah &a Duck use a train replacement service and go on a quest for fudge!

6.title: Magic Panic
6.plot: Umbrella's plan to impress his friend Primrose with a magic show goes somewhat adrift!

7.title: Birthday Buoy
7.plot: To celebrate John's birthday, Cloud Captain takes the gang on an ocean adventure!

8.title: Alarm Cluck
8.plot: Sarah and Duck take a trip to the Big Shop to get a new alarm clock.

9.title: Twang Ball
9.plot: Everyone in the Park joins in with Scarf Lady's new game!

10.title: Auto Cat
10.plot: Duck feels left out when Sarah gets a demanding new toy.

11.title: Fluff Bread
11.plot: Sarah and Duck help the baker bake Shoku-pan, a light and fluffy type of Japanese bread.

12.title: Moon Bow
12.plot: On a rainy night searching for a constellation Sarah and Duck meet an unexpected friend.

13.title: Mountain Mints
13.plot: Sarah and Duck help Bread Man and Cake bake a special Japanese bread for Flamingo and John.

14.title: Bench Blocked
14.plot: When Sarah and Duck's favourite bench is in use, the pair find other things to do.

15.title: Planetarium Aquarium
15.plot: Sarah and Duck go to the aquarium to track down a waving fish.

16.title: Shallot Boat
16.plot: After a night of strong rain, the Shallots set sail on a seafaring adventure.

17.title: Cake Decorate
17.plot: Cake decides to teach Sarah and Duck how to decorate with icing!

18.title: Balloon Barnacles
18.plot: Sarah's hat goes on an adventure without her, on top of a balloon.

19.title: Basking Shark
19.plot: Sarah is keen to adopt a sea creature, but doesn't get her first choice...

20.title: Old Toys
20.plot: Duck is bored of his toy collection, so he and Sarah search for old toys in the attic.

21.title: Hair Cut
21.plot: Sarah's hair keeps getting in her way, so it's time for a trip to the hairdressers.

22.title: Constable Quack
22.plot: When their snacks go missing, Sergeant Sarah & Constable Quack hunt for a biscuit burglar.

23.title: Arcade Dance Off
23.plot: Stumbling across an arcade, Sarah takes on a dancing challenge with John.

24.title: Mars as Moon
24.plot: Mars tries to fill in for a missing Moon, but needs a little coaching from Sarah & Duck.

25.title: Donkey Jump
25.plot: Sarah & Duck try to help Donkey get his jumping confidence back.

26.title: Rainbow Race
26.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

27.title: Perimeter Pals
27.plot: Sarah, Duck and Bug set off on a big adventure, through uncharted territory, as they attempt to cycle all the way around the park.

28.title: Pillow Fill
28.plot: Scarf Lady helps Sarah and Duck catch the fluffs and puffs to refill their pillows.

29.title: Castle Scribbling
29.plot: Whilst visiting a castle, Sarah and Duck's drawings lead them to an exciting discovery.

30.title: Cloud Jam
30.plot: Music Lady needs Sarah and Duck's help with a music-loving stowaway.

31.title: Boo Night
31.plot: Sarah and Duck learn all about Boo Night and attempt to make their own scary costumes.

32.title: Comet's Coming
32.plot: Sarah and Duck are excited to visit the observatory to see a passing comet.

33.title: Whatsathingy
33.plot: Sarah and Duck try to work out exactly what it is that Scarf Lady has been knitting in her sleep.

34.title: Brolly Bus
34.plot: When Umbrella gets left on the bus, Sarah and Duck head to the bus depot to find him.

35.title: Hedge Opera
35.plot: Sarah is fascinated by some mysterious music coming from the hedge.

36.title: Park Trimming
36.plot: Sarah and Duck spot a patch of garden in the park that needs some care, but can't seem to find a gardener.

37.title: Haber Dasher
37.plot: When the zip on Sarah's hoodie breaks, Scarf Lady suggests a trip to the haberdasher.

38.title: Cinema Scoot
38.plot: Sarah and Duck join Scooter Boy at the cinema to watch his favourite film, but the sound doesn't seem to be working.

39.title: Snowball Skate
39.plot: Sarah and Duck explore a Winter Fair in the park, and discover an amazing skating rink inside a giant snowball!

40.title: Ribbon Alvida
40.plot: An excited Sarah and Duck take the Shallots to see the Ribbon Sisters perform with their family circus.

1.title: Lots of Shallots
1.plot: Sarah & Duck find some free seeds in their newspaper and plant them to see what grows.

2.title: Sarah Duck and the Penguins
2.plot: Duck really wants to be a penguin, so Sarah decides it is time for a trip to the zoo.

3.title: Cheer Up Donkey
3.plot: Sarah & Duck attempt to find out why their friend Donkey seems so sad.

4.title: Cake Bake
4.plot: It's Duck's birthday so Sarah decides to bake a cake to celebrate.

5.title: Scarf Lady's House
5.plot: Scarf Lady welcomes Sarah & Duck to her house full of scarves.

6.title: Robot Juice
6.plot: Duck isn't careful enough with his favorite toy robot.

7.title: Bouncy Ball
7.plot: Sarah's brand new bouncy ball has a rather unexpected problem.

8.title: Rainbow Lemon
8.plot: Sarah & Duck make a colorful new friend during breakfast.

9.title: Sit Shop
9.plot: When Duck's chair breaks, a bus trip to a very special shop is in order.

10.title: Kite Flight
10.plot: On a windy day, Sarah and Duck try to get their new Kite to fly.

11.title: Umbrella and the Rain
11.plot: Sarah finds an umbrella that doesn't seem to like the rain.

12.title: Big Shop
12.plot: Sarah & Duck visit a large department store, looking for some new toys.

13.title: Woolen Music
13.plot: Scarf Lady's Jukebox inspires a knitted instrument band.

14.title: Doubles
14.plot: Sarah and Duck try to play a tennis doubles match, but are two players short.

15.title: Fairground
15.plot: A Fairground is being held in the park, but Sarah & Duck can't find their bench.

16.title: Sarah Gets a Cold
16.plot: When Sarah has a cold, Duck helps her enjoy a visit to the doctors.

17.title: Ribbon Sisters
17.plot: Sarah & Duck are trying to exercise but the neighbors need their help.

18.title: Stargazing
18.plot: Sarah and Duck are excited about seeing some shooting stars.

19.title: Coloured Light
19.plot: Rainbow's colorful glow inspires an art project.

20.title: Strawberry Souffle
20.plot: A sleepy Sarah attempts to bake a dessert for a hungry Duck.

21.title: Camera
21.plot: Inspired by a nature documentary, Sarah & Duck attempt to take photographs of birds.

22.title: Tapping Shoes
22.plot: Sarah needs some new shoes, but picks out a very unusual pair...

23.title: Bobsleigh
23.plot: Sarah & Duck learn to Bobsleigh and have a speedy, snowy adventure with Scarf Lady's help.

24.title: Fireworks Dance
24.plot: A game of hide and seek takes longer than usual when Duck gets scared by some fireworks.

25.title: Fancy Park
25.plot: When their local park is closed, Sarah and Duck try to find a suitable alternative.

26.title: Pipe Conductor
26.plot: Sarah & Duck are woken up by a loud clanging overhead and decide to investigate the noise...

27.title: Slow Quest
27.plot: Tortoise is on a mission straight through Sarah and Duck's house! The pair try to work out what he's crawling towards.

28.title: World Bread Day
28.plot: When there's a bread festival in the park, Sarah & Duck find themselves part of an exciting treasure hunt.

29.title: Pond Princess
29.plot: Sarah is awarded a crown by the ducks at the pond, so tries to work out what her royal duties should be!

30.title: Scared of Stairs
30.plot: Flamingo and John get invited around to Sarah & Duck's house, but there is a big obstacle for John.

31.title: Balloon Race
31.plot: Scarf Lady takes to the skies in a knitted hot air balloon to race against an old sporting friend.

32.title: Puncture Pump
32.plot: When their tandem bike gets a flat tire, Sarah and Duck hope to get help from the local bike shop.

33.title: Plate Fog
33.plot: Sarah and Duck turn detectives when their friend, Plate Girl, loses her plate on a foggy day.

34.title: Moon Paint
34.plot: Sarah and Duck give Moon painting lessons after being inspired by a trip to the Art Gallery.

35.title: The Play
35.plot: Sarah and Duck dress up as each other and decide to perform a play!

36.title: Bread Bike
36.plot: When Bread Man needs help, Sarah and Duck come to the rescue with their tandem bike!

37.title: Bug's Button Bank
37.plot: Bug's plant is looking droopy, but his button collecting seems to be the cause of the problem...

38.title: No More Wool
38.plot: Scarf Lady has run out of wool so Sarah and Duck help her to harvest the weeping woolen tree.

39.title: Octagon Club
39.plot: Sarah decides that octagons are her favorite shape, so starts an 8 person club to celebrate!

40.title: Petal Light Picking
40.plot: Sarah wants some special lights for her Christmas tree and Bug knows where she might find them...

1.title: Outside Outside
1.plot: The Shallots want to explore beyond the front garden, so Sarah comes up with a plan...

2.title: Umbrella Bubbles
2.plot: After getting muddy, Umbrella has to brave his fear of getting wet and take his first bath.

3.title: Cloud Tower
3.plot: A search for shade on a hot day leads Sarah and Duck to discover a fascinating tower in the park.

4.title: Sound Jumble
4.plot: When Sarah hears some interesting music on the radio, she and Duck try to recreate it.

5.title: The Mouse's Birthday
5.plot: Sarah is hoping for a nice, quiet birthday, but does not get her wish once her friends arrive.

6.title: Tortoise Snooze
6.plot: Sarah and Duck help Tortoise prepare to hibernate.

7.title: Fast Slow Bungalow
7.plot: Flamingo and John give Sarah and Duck a tour of their house and invite them to play their favorite game...

8.title: Bags of Bags
8.plot: Scarf Lady has misplaced Bag in the Big Shop, so Sarah and Duck help with the search.

9.title: Ribbon Fall
9.plot: The Ribbon Sisters invite Sarah & Duck to their favourite seasonal event in the park.

10.title: Garden Gaming
10.plot: Duck is getting frustrated with his new computer game, so Sarah builds a version he can play.

11.title: Seacow Snow Trail
11.plot: Sarah and Duck have received some Christmas Presents and are keen to find out who delivered them.

12.title: Origami Overload
12.plot: John has a problem with the origami flamingos he has made and needs Sarah and Duck's help.

13.title: Shallot Circus
13.plot: The Shallots have discovered acrobatics and are inspired by the Ribbon Sisters to put on a show.

14.title: Toy Tidy
14.plot: Duck has been leaving his toys everywhere, so Sarah decides to assist him with tiding his bedroom...

15.title: Plate Escape
15.plot: Whilst at the Big Shop, Sarah, Duck and Plate Girl discover some unusual inhabitants in the Plant Section...

16.title: The Big Sleepover
16.plot: Sarah and Duck invite some friends over for a sleepover, but getting to sleep is tougher than planned...

17.title: Paisley Sea
17.plot: Sarah and Duck think they are headed to the zoo, but the bus takes a surprising diversion!

18.title: Duck's Quack
18.plot: Duck has lost his quack, so Sarah suggests visiting the spare sounds section of the Big Shop.

19.title: Rainbow's Niece
19.plot: Sarah's new color wheel reminds Rainbow that he has not seen his Niece for a while...

20.title: Decorating Donkey
20.plot: It's nearly time for Tortoise to wake up from hibernation so Sarah plans a pretty surprise.

21.title: Duck Hotel
21.plot: Duck wins a trip for two to a rather exciting hotel and finds that he settles in much quicker than Sarah...

22.title: Parasol Show
22.plot: Umbrella is nervous about meeting up with his pen pal at the Parasol Show, so Sarah and Duck accompany him.

23.title: Extra Bounce
23.plot: John's yellow bouncy ball is too bouncy, but Sarah thinks she knows where the solution can be found.

24.title: Cake Relocate
24.plot: Sarah & Duck help Cake find a new home.

25.title: Lost Librarian
25.plot: The Librarian has lost his big reference book and Sarah thinks her toy periscope might help with the search.

26.title: Scooter Stand Still
26.plot: Scooter Boy gets his confidence knocked after a small accident, so Sarah and Duck help him to get it back.

27.title: Music Fixer
27.plot: Sarah's tuba is making some very peculiar sounds, so a trip to the Music Shop is in order.

28.title: Wool on Wheels
28.plot: Scarf lady is holding a knitted treats sale in the park, but the weather is causing a problem.

29.title: Lemon Café
29.plot: Sarah and Duck discover a Lemon Cafe in the park, but it seems to be nearly closing time...

30.title: Star Renovation
30.plot: Venus has attempted to redecorate the night sky, but now Sarah can't find any of her favorite constellations.

31.title: Woolly Memories
31.plot: Scarf Lady's old film reels get themselves in a tangle, so Sarah and Duck decide to recreate the footage.

32.title: Beach Break
32.plot: Sarah and Duck decide to spend a day at a the beach building sand animals.

33.title: Bubble Bumbling
33.plot: The Bubble Man is in town, so a visit to The Big Shop is in order for Sarah, Duck and Donkey.

34.title: Toggle Tangle
34.plot: After Sarah helps Scarf Lady prepare the wool for her new roof, she settles down for a dreamy sleep.

35.title: Tummy Talk
35.plot: When Sarah forgets her sandwich, her rumbling tummy inadvertently starts a conversation with a Frog.

36.title: Moon's Exhibition
36.plot: A trip to the art gallery unexpectedly helps Duck with the hunt for his lost toy Rhino.

37.title: Pond Prose
37.plot: Sarah listens to a poetry record and decides to make up some poetry of her own.

38.title: The Art of Pink
38.plot: The art gallery is holding a celebration of the color pink and Sarah is keen to take part.

39.title: Bug Pop
39.plot: Bug and his friends lead Sarah and Duck to their outdoor music concert.

40.title: Duck Flies
40.plot: Duck sees some flying, migrating ducks in the sky and decides he would like to try it too.

imdb.plot outline: Sarah is a young british girl whose best friend happens to be a mallard named, Duck. Everyday they embark on small adventures learning about the world as they go with the help of their friends. From Sarah's love of the tuba and sea cows to Duck' s obsession with bread there's always much to do, even if that simply means a good sit-and-think.
imdb.title: Sarah & Duck
plot: Sarah is a young british girl whose best friend happens to be a mallard named, Duck. Everyday they embark on small adventures learning about the world as they go with the help of their friends. From Sarah's love of the tuba and sea cows to Duck' s obsession with bread there's always much to do, even if that simply means a good sit-and-think.::Daniel Wynne
